column5: Well, we got here safe and sound then I got one heck of a cold so I haven't had a chance to do much of anything yet but I have checked out the local pier and some fishing charters.  So far the days have been beautiful, a few showers, and a bit of wind but reasonably warm. This morning the sun is shining, the seas are calm, I think I am goingto have a steak and eggs then spend the rest of the day sitting on the pier enjoying the sun and meeting some of the locals.  Have a super day all!
Sounds like a good day to me.....Enjoy!  dk
I don't know if it still exists, but if you want to go out and enjoy some night-life, Mother Fletcher's was the best bar in Myrtle Beach 20 years ago.

Hey Cliff, great to hear from you.  Glad you're finally getting a chance to relax.  I too have had a cold for the last week, but I'd rather have it in florida than here .  Enjoy yourself and say hey to Sue  Maureen
Morning Cliff, have a great day and enjoy your relaxation.  Cheers.  Joey
well winter has finally come here..snow and cold so enjoy the vacation
